meanings.definition: Capable of being sent via fax.
meanings.sent1: The document is faxable, so we can easily send it to the client.
meanings.sent2: Please make sure the form is faxable before trying to send it.
meanings.sent3: I never thought a piece of paper could be so faxable!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a faxable message, easily transmitted and understood.
meanings.sent5: The idea was so clear, it was as faxable as a picture.

meanings.definition: Suitable for transmission by fax machine.
meanings.sent1: Is this document faxable, or do we need to find another way to send it?
meanings.sent2: The contract needs to be faxable to ensure it reaches the recipient on time.
meanings.sent3: I find it amusing how some papers are more faxable than others.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as faxable as a perfectly printed page.
meanings.sent5: The instructions were so clear, they were as faxable as a direct call.
